#include<iostream>
#include<string>
using namespace std;
string reverseString(string r){
    string change;
    for(int i=r.length()-1;i>=0;i--)
        change += r[i];
    return change;
}
int main(){
    int t,half;
    string str;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--){
        cin>>str;
        half = str.length()/2;
        cout<<reverseString(str.substr(0,half))+reverseString(str.substr(half,str.length()))<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
